name: alfatraining/alfaview-php-sdk
description: ## Format information * All time fields are returned in RFC3339 format and in UTC if not mentioned otherwise.  ## Authentication ### API Key and Credentials All API requests require an access token for authorization. Access tokens can be obtained by authenticating using any of the following endpoints: - [Authenticate via API key](https://apis.alfaview.com/v2/docs/openapi#/operations/AuthenticateAPIKey) - [Authenticate via password](https://apis.alfaview.com/v2/docs/openapi#/operations/AuthenticatePassword) - [Authenticate a guest (guest link)](https://apis.alfaview.com/v2/docs/openapi#/operations/AuthenticateGuestLink) - [Authenticate a guest (group link)](https://apis.alfaview.com/v2/docs/openapi#/operations/AuthenticateGroupLink) The access token is returned as a base64-encoded string. It needs to be used as the value in the `Authorization` header in all subsequent API requests.  ### Token Time-To-Live (TTL) Access tokens are valid for 1 hour. After this period, tokens will be expired and a new token must be obtained.
